Reviews.Title: Very effective for presentations
Reviews.Author: Jaffrey W. Ali "Relentless Pursuit of Technology"
Reviews.Content: This is a very quality screen and works very well as a presentation screen. The touch screen takes a little getting used to. What I like is being able to seamlessly go back and forth between presentation and whiteboard views.Effective sales/demo screen for your business. I bought it with the rolling stand which is also very high quality.You can connect a Mac mini running windows 7 to the back along with a Bluetooth keyboard for a completely clean install.
